fields.text_html:
Welcome

This is an experiment in decision-making. You will earn money based on the decisions you and others make in the experiment. We will pay you at the end of the session.

You are one of #number_of_players# participants in this session. We have assigned you the ID label "#player_id_label#", which is visible to the other people in this session.

The session has #part_count# parts, each part has #period_count# periods.

Each part is independent of the other #part_count-1# parts.

In each part, your earnings do not depend on the earnings or choices in the other #part_count-1# parts.

Before each part begins, we will give you instructions explaining how it works.

Continue to the next page of the instructions by pressing the Next  button in the bottom right corner of this frame.

Part 1

Part one has two steps. In Step 1 the computer will show the same image to everyone in the experiment. This image is shown in the top left corner of the frame below.

Possible images:

#outcome_images#

The image can be either #outcome_name_list#. Everyone in the session sees the same image.

In Step 2, shown on the right side of the frame below, you must report either #outcome_name_list#. To do so click one of the images and press the Report button at the bottom of the frame.

Everyone in the session will repeat the following process #period_count# times in this part. First, the computer will show everyone the same image, then everyone will make a report.

Continue to the next page of the instructions.

Part 1 Earnings

You have two possible earnings outcomes for this part. 

  1. If all #period_count# of your reports are in the majority in every period in this part you earn $#pay_choice_majority#.
  2. If one or more of your #period_count# reports in this part is not in the majority you instead earn $#pay_choice_minority#.

For your report to be in the majority, it must match at least #minimum_for_majority-1# other reports.

If you have a question, please raise your hand, and someone will help you.

This is the end of the instructions. If you have any questions, please raise your hand and a monitor will come by to answer them.  If you are finished with the instructions, please click the Start   button located in the bottom right of this frame.  The instructions will remain on your screen until the experiment begins.  We need everyone to click the  Start   button before we can begin the experiment.
